name: Green Stewards
description: Visitacion Valley Greenway Project is the sponsor of the Green Stewards Program, a special after-school and summer program. The year-long educational program incorporates outdoor environmental education experiences and field trips. The Green Stewards Program is ongoing with a weekly meeting after school and occasionally on Saturdays and Sundays, which provide the following for participating youth: Orientation and ongoing training in urban gardening and environmental education at the Visitacion V
